GOODMUON: (Muon_pt>20 and abs(Muon_eta)<2.4 and Muon_isGlobal and Muon_isTracker and abs(Muon_dz)<0.10 and abs(Muon_dxy) < 0.05) and Muon_mediumId and Muon_pfRelIso04_all < 0.15
LOOSEmuons: (Muon_pt>10 and abs(Muon_eta)<2.4 and Muon_isGlobal and Muon_isTracker and abs(Muon_dz)<0.10 and abs(Muon_dxy) < 0.05) and Muon_looseId and Muon_pfRelIso04_all < 0.30
LOOSEelectrons: (Electron_pt>10 and abs(Electron_eta) < 2.5 and abs(Electron_dz)<0.5 and abs(Electron_dxy) < 0.2 and Electron_mvaIso)
GOODJETSALL: (Jet_pt>25 and abs(Jet_eta)<4.7 and jetMuon_mask and jetID_mask)
BJETS: (Jet_pt>20 and abs(Jet_eta)<2.5 and Jet_btagPNetB>0.245 and jetMuon_mask and jetID_mask)
